scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run install-dependencies
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build --prefix ./dorfladen-frontend && mkdir dist/src/static && cp dorfladen-frontend/dist/dorfladen-frontend/* dist/src/static
scripts.install-dependencies: cp dorfladen-backend/package.json dist && cp dorfladen-backend/package-lock.json dist && npm i --prefix ./dist
